segments.text: I think the perspective of this kitchen scene is interesting, angled just right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's there by the sink, towel in hand, polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is full to the brim and overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, hitting the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, foot in the growing puddle on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, the boy's on a two-step stool, reaching into the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's right there, labeled clearly for all to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing a plate too, which makes the whole thing precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands attentively, arm up towards the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are tied back on the window, showing the tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the way outside, peaceful as can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much is happening without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR
